sure
9.1.18  1:08 pm   Whats your favourite Bill Wurtz song
9.1.18  12:52 pm   what if the universe was made up of AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
9.1.18  12:33 pm   Is there any hidden meaning behind the lyrics in your newest songs?
9.1.18  12:31 pm   do people truly have souls?

9.1.18  12:16 pm   be real, are there any things you learned on your journey that you're not giving credit? like books or how-to stuff for making music,

      or did you actually just pick up everything forcefully?
9.1.18  11:23 am   how do i make the most of solitude?
9.1.18  10:39 am   Favourite jazz saxophonist?
9.1.18  10:13 am   What if, just for kicks, you did this anagram right here on the questions page: I love you dad
9.1.18  9:13 am   pear shaped apples or apple shaped pears?

9.1.18  8:46 am   sometimes i think the reason why i want to be successful is that i want to be intensely envied by specific people in my life one day. i don't know, but do you think that this kind of thinking is really conducive to success? (it is motivating).
9.1.18  7:55 am   what is the origin of origins?

9.1.18  7:16 am   fun fact, if you progressively reduce the time to make each music video by 75% for each video, then on september 9th we will reach a singularity where you produce an infinite number of them in the span of a millisecond
9.1.18  5:54 am   People don't like me, how do I fix that?
9.1.18  3:41 am   how do you feel about people who say "this person is high" in your comments? i often see the same type of comment on anything "weird" and it really annoys me
9.1.18  3:04 am   i have dangerous amounts of unwarranted hope and secretive ambition
9.1.18  3:03 am   is it possible to make it if you go the whole way telling yourself you won't
9.1.18  1:41 am   i'll never do anything
9.1.18  1:38 am   bill what was your early life like?

9.1.18  1:32 am   Do you believe?







PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

8.31.18  10:58 pm   What if there was no Christian God, and only Zeus, Poseidon and Hades as our Main Gods?

8.31.18  7:56 pm   So far, do you think you'll be able to finish the new video by Sept. 4th?
8.31.18  7:13 pm   have you ever thought about upgrading from Logic Pro to some other software? and, would you ever release a compilation of your songs on vinyl if given the oppurtunity?

8.31.18  7:06 pm   so there's this conspiracy theory that is supported by many people who are most definitely not me that says that every answer you give to every question on this page is secretly an anagram for a phrase, which when all of them are combined forms a final message, that when converted to binary and inverting every bit, forms an mp3 file with your musical magnum opus. care to comment? asking for a friend
8.31.18  6:57 pm   https://youtu.be/OYtLmgtxy4g were the clips of you speaking in this video made for the video or from a reality thing u cut up? cause it looks like it could be from reality tbh
8.31.18  6:42 pm   do you like cough syrup?

8.31.18  5:48 pm   is video significantly different in style as a result of the irrefutable fact that it is coming out on sept 4?

      it seems like you will have to cut lots of corners to condense what is usually 2 months of work into 25% of the time
8.31.18  5:38 pm   will you start making short vids again? just asking.
8.31.18  5:32 pm   Do you think "za" is a socially acceptable abbreviation of pizza? Asking for a friend.
8.31.18  5:10 pm   How do I know you're not an alien?

8.31.18  11:06 am   have you considered writing a longer piece of music? like a simphony?

this

this
